title: vincent l. ott
text:
To draw meaningful conclusions from data, you must visualize it.
Raincloud plots are incredibly useful for this.
And the best thing is: You can make your own in a few clicks.


Raincloud Plot of Bodymass and Flipper Length in Penguins

title: vincent l. ott
text:
astronaut spacewalking
A spacewalk is “any activity in outer space outside a spacecraft” (Wikipedia).








Based on the paper by Corlett et al. (2020). Bottom plot done in mere clicks.
Technically, both space and moon walk times are shown (extravehicular activity).
